reviewText:
Strangely appealing for its unusual characters and themes. Another reviewer mentioned that their child loved it but the parent didn't. So who is the target audience, I ask. There are a couple of words that many would object to, but they fly past almost unnoticeably. But to each his own offensive element.
After all, the whole thing would be objectionable to vegans, as fish get eaten.

Wow this is a BAD movie - So so bad.
My kids loved it (especially my four year old).
I thought it was awful.

First off I would have given this cartoon movie a higher rating, but why must a cartoon that is teach kids to eat fish have curse words it in?

"Never wanting to endure the taste of fish again, 10-year-old Opil jokingly wishes for his dinner to disappear forever. But the wish becomes a reality when space mutants from his favorite comic books come to life and threaten to dry up all the oceans. Now he must team up with the heroic Captain Mackerel and his daughter Marina and undo his wish before it's too late."
